name: Pixel Dungeon (itch) (SerOleg)
description:
One of my largest and most complete games. Built entirely in C++ using the SFML framework, this project features a full length game complete with a victory and defeat condition and full audio implementation. 

Some interesting game features include

  • Two different spell types to chose from (Fire and Frost)
  • Procedurally generated dungeon layout
  • Informative minimap
  • HP and MP system
  • Variety of unqiue enemy types, each with their own attacks
  • Character power upgrades
  • Two unique shop rooms
  • Traps
  • An intense bossfight with multiple mechanics and stages
  • Epic loot!
  • Audio effects and music
  • Menu screens and tutorial screen

A few minor bugs are present as this is an old project. Recommended to play at a resolution of 1920x1080
